snippet.title: Sportsfriends on PS3 and PS4 | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Sportsfriends will be available May 6th on PS3 and PS4 for $14.99. Sportsfriends is a compendium of award-winning local multiplayer games for living rooms, parties, and even backyards. Featuring: retro-style fighting game BaraBariBall, QWOP-like pole vault dueling game Super Pole Riders, high-velocity sports game Hokra, and face-to-face physical party game Johann Sebastian Joust. All the games are playable with DualShocks, while Johann Sebastian Joust can be further enhanced by the PlayStation Move controller.

http://sportsfriendsgame.com/

©Die Gute Fabrik. All Rights Reserved.
